  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Default, Legacy, ScarfXML

    public interface TypeSpecificArg
    TypeSpecificArg interface.
    Since:
    01.01.02

    The interface containing the commandline check for each messaging useage

    • Method Detail

      • inputValidation

        java.lang.Boolean inputValidation(EnvironmentInformation info,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
                           throws ExceptionHandler
        The interface for each type of routing to handle the raw command line arguments.
        Parameters:
        info - EnvironmentInformation - the continuation of the environmental info to be added onto.
        args - String - The full set of arguments passed from the command line
        Returns:
        Boolean - an indication if the validation passed.
        Throws:
        ExceptionHandler - - The main controlled exception.

        getOptions.
        Returns:
        a Options object.
